crutch.translation[0].definitions[0].def: one of a pair of long sticks that you put under your arms to help you walk when you have hurt your leg
crutch.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I was on crutches for three months after the operation.
crutch.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that gives someone support or help, especially something that is not really good for them
crutch.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: As things got worse at work, he began to use alcohol as a crutch.
crutch.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the part of your body between the tops of your legs
